Additionally , child ADHD often develop aggressive behavior , usually adequately suppressed standard stimulant treatment ADHD . In order address problem , many physician prescribe multiple medication . There clinical evidence , however , prove method safe effective . This study ass whether add mood stabilizer , divalproex sodium , stimulant treatment effective stimulant treatment alone reduce aggressive behavior among child ADHD . Participants double blind study first receive open label stimulant treatment ADHD comorbid disruptive behavior disorder . Participants whose aggressive behavior subsides stimulant treatment alone proceed next phase study . Participants whose ADHD symptoms lessen treatment whose aggressive behavior persists randomly assign receive either divalproex sodium placebo addition stimulant treatment 8 week . Study visit hold weekly 11 16 week . At visit , aggression level medication side effect assess . Families also meet researcher discuss child 's progress , attend behavioral counseling therapist .
